title: MNF review: Monday Night Football with Slaven Bilic and Jamie Carragher
description: Swansea boost survival hopes, Alfie Mawson upstages Virgil van Dijk, and Slaven Bilic talks Dimitri Payet's West Ham exit... Here's all you need to know from Monday Night Football....
content: How should bottom-half sides set up when they face a top six side in the Premier League? Carragher and Bilic discuss...Carragher and Bilic went on to debate why changing managers is reaping rewards for so many Premier League clubs.Alfie Mawson scored the winner as Swansea boosted their survival hopes with a battling 1-0 victory over Liverpool at the Liberty Stadium.READ HEREBilic has been warned...He also made his own dress code for MNF...And the former West Ham manager impressed a Sky Sports Cricket pundit...After Alexandre Lacazette, Mame Biram Diouf and Willian all scored brilliant goals involving either a flick or a back heel over the weekend, we asked you to tell us which one was your favourite.And like Carragher, you picked Willian's strike (49 per cent) as your favourite ahead of Lacazette (42 per cent) and Diouf (nine per cent).Watch all three of those wondergoals below...YOUR Twitter questions are answered with Bilic describing what it was like having to deal with player power and having his star player Dimitri Payet wanting to leave West Ham...
